text: A mockumentary is a movie that pretends to be a documentary. It pretends to tell a true story, but is really a work of fiction. The word is a combination (a portmanteau word) of "mock" (meaning fake or false) and "documentary". == Other websites == * Websters Dictionary definition * Lists of Mockumentary at UC Berkeley Mockumentary Collection * Mockumentary - Reflexivity, satire and a call to play Category:Documentary movies
title: Mockumentary
